title: Not getting any new Worlds Missions?
body:
I finished the first three Worlds Missions then I bought the Worlds Master Pass, completed those missions as well. As of right now I have 75 Tokens. It is already half way into the second week but i have yet to receive new missions. Is this a glitch? When will I receive new missions? What day of the week do we receive new Worlds Missions?

The missions I have completed are: 

*  _Welcome To Worlds_
*  _Skill - Quick To Win_
* _Teamwork - Objective Control_
* _Fight For Glory_
* _(Master Pass) Courage - Knock 'em Down_
* _(Master Pass) Resilience - Set 'em Up_

As of right now the only Worlds Mission that is standing is _"A Real Challenger"_, which requires you to complete 4 Worlds Missions.

replies.body: At first, it seemed like we would all be getting the second set of missions in the second week, but at this point, it's looking like they might not pop up until next week. I haven't been given any concrete info on when these missions are releasing yet =\
Then technically are we not losing out on two missions? And for the people who bought a Masters Pass loosing out on 4 missions? Is Riot going to compensate people who have purchased the pass?
You haven't lost any missions, they just haven't been activated yet. I just got word earlier today that the 2nd set of missions *should* be activated on Oct 2.

Broporo, what is Riot planning to do in the event that the missions are not released by the stated date? Are they planning to give us the extra week and a half to complete these missions (not that it should be a problem for people like me who play faithfully every day anyway, but for those who do not...)?  A lot of us who bought the pass are already feeling a bit scammed for our money, not to mention how many people were upset with the results from buying the dungeon pass for the arcade event strictly for the icon simply to have it changed anyway... but even aside from that people are beginning to question the missions and whether or not having these passes available to purchase gives the game  a pay to play feeling. This delay in mission updates without any official statements from Riot is... disappointing, to say the least. 

Please tell us there will be SOMETHING extra, whether it be extra time to complete the missions or a bonus orb or even a key fragment, for those of us who bought the passes?

There hasn't been a delay in the missions releasing, it's just we didn't have the exact dates until now. They'll be releasing on Oct 2, and it just looks like the first set was up for 2 weeks while the next ones will be weekly. Not 100% sure why this event had a little gap between the missions tbh. 

Porocles and I do our best to provide you guys with all of the info you need as soon as we can, but sometimes we just don't have any more information than you guys do =\

My apologies, by delay I had meant the gap between the initial release on the 21st to what next is supposed to be the 2nd of October. I had assumed they would still only release the few missions and not release everything that should be to date (assuming that they go past the 2nd, anyway). Thank you for clarifying though - I'm still hoping for some sort of official statement to let players know. I'd be happy even with a "Hey guys, we dunno when it's coming back, but it will!" On the front page, instead of having to sift through various board posts about it. 

That's just preference though, I'm blunt and up front and have a tendency to expect others to be as well. {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

Oct 2. 7.07pm CEST. Missions still haven't appeared...

I try to update the status throughout the day
about 7 hours later... STILL NO MISSIONS! plz rito :'(

well...
"During this year’s Worlds, we’ve put together a series of **~~weekly missions~~** for you that are sure to challenge you. Starting 9/21/17 at 11:00 AM PT until the day after Finals, we’ll have a set of challenging missions for you that **~~will change each week~~**. Completing these Missions will earn you Tokens."

what happened to weekly?

i really wanna do missions...
and i cant wait till monday! it be so much better to get them onm fridays to just rush the misison son sat and sunday, and then if you didnt make it to save them for the rest of the week. now i probably have to rush and complete in one weekend as im busy with scool in the week.
